metadata.name: Chamber 2
metadata.description: 36 Chambers is a collection of 36 generative artworks that captures hue shifts of the pixelated version of cr³’s painting „Five“ (2022, 100cm x 80cm, acrylic on canvas, see [crcrcr.xyz](https://crcrcr.xyz/paintings)). Each generative output — each new chamber — marks a slight hue shift in both ways of the range of colors, from -18 to 18. No two chambers are the same.
